author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Labour Department is conducting an enrolment camp for unorganised workers and construction employees on Thursday.

Avail benefits

According to a press statement, workers who are not yet a part of the 17 labour welfare boards that are functioning for the benefit of unorganised workers can participate in the camp at the Chennai Corporation Community hall at Thiruvenkatapuram First Street, Choolaimedu, from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m.

By enrolling themselves and becoming members of the welfare boards, they can avail themselves of the benefits of the State government, the statement added.
title: Enrolment camp for unorganised workers
